paragraph.heading: 1Undoing and redoing
paragraph.paragraph: Almost all actions in the diagram tool are undoable. Every action that can be undone, can also be redone. For advanced undoing, open the history tool.
paragraph.tip: Tip: Undo actions cannot be undone. Use redo to undo an undo action.

list.item:
To undo the last action, click Undo last action.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_undo_color.gif

To redo the last action, click Redo last action.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_redo_color.gif

To undo all actions up until a specific action:
Click the History tool button.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_cmd_history_color.gif
The History tool dialog appears with a list of all undoable actions. By clicking on one of the actions, the diagram returns to the state it was in just after you performed this action.
/images/eiffelstudio/dialogs_and_wizards/history-tool.png

paragraph.note: Note: When an action is performed that cannot be undone, the history tool is emptied.
